entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 02:43 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 02:43 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 02:43 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
